translation.en: [Storyteller] ♪ Come and gather 'round Listen to the story ♪
translation.es: Reúnanse acá y escuchen la historia

translation.en: ♪ Here in Xus Park Where the spirits play ♪
translation.es: del parque Xus donde viven los espíritus.

translation.en: ♪ Someone must protect Chumash territory ♪
♪ Who will hear The call to save the day? ♪
translation.es: ¿Quién se hará cargo y será el héroe?

translation.en: -♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Oh yeah! ♪
-♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Cho-ho! ♪
-♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Yeah ♪
♪ Hurricane or flood Sleeping sun or blizzard ♪
♪ Kodi, Summer hawk, Eddy turtle too ♪
translation.es: son Kodi, Summer Halcón y Eddy Tortuga.

translation.en: -♪ With their friend Coyote ♪ -♪ And their best friend, Lizard ♪
translation.es: - Con su amigo Coyote. - Y su mejor amiga Lagarto.

translation.en: ♪ Come and join the fun And we'll all say ♪ ♪ Haku! ♪
translation.es: - Únete a la diversión y todos diremos: - ¡Haku!

translation.en: -♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Oh yeah! ♪
-♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Cho-ho! ♪
♪ Here come the Spirit Rangers ♪
-♪ The Spirit Rangers ♪ -♪ Yeah! ♪
Whose idea was it to play stick game so early?
translation.es: ¿De quién fue la idea de jugar tan temprano?

translation.en: Oh, come on, Kodi. It's not that bad.
translation.es: Vamos, Kodi. No está tan mal.

translation.en: Mom's bringing the white sticks, but I have the winner sticks.
translation.es: Mamá traerá los palos blancos, pero yo tengo los ganadores.

translation.en: Hmm, they have a stripe.
-[Lizard] Oh, praying mantis. -Huh?
Oh, you'll be the tastiest bug… in my bugsagna.
translation.es: Serás el bicho más sabroso de mi bichosaña.

translation.en: Well, you found one winner stick. But where are the rest of them?
translation.es: Encontraste un palo ganador. ¿Y el resto?

translation.en: -[Mom] Who's ready to play stick game? -[gasps] Jump in, Lizard, before Mom sees.
translation.es: ¿Listos para jugar? Entra, que mamá no te vea.

translation.en: [Lizard] Sweet dreams.
What a beautiful morning for stick game. You guys ready to play?
translation.es: Linda mañana para el juego del palo. ¿Listos para jugar?

translation.en: It's a lot of fun, and the rules are easy.
translation.es: Es muy divertido y las reglas son fáciles.

translation.en: Let's show them. There are two teams.
One team hides a stick in each hand.
translation.es: Un equipo esconde un palo en cada mano.

translation.en: The second team guesses which hand has the stick with the stripe.
translation.es: El otro equipo adivina qué mano tiene el palo con la raya.

translation.en: Take a guess, if you dare.
Oh man!
[chuckles] Gotcha.
That was just practice. Wait 'til we're in teams.
translation.es: Era práctica. Espera a estar en equipos.

translation.en: The more hands, the harder to guess.
translation.es: Es difícil adivinar con más manos.

translation.en: We're in a huckleberry jam, everyone. I think we got the time wrong.
translation.es: Hay problemas. Creo que nos equivocamos de hora.

translation.en: -I don't see the sun rising anywhere. -Huh. Maybe Sunny's asleep. I mean--
translation.es: No veo salir el sol. Tal vez Sol está dormido. Digo…

translation.en: Weird. Our watches must be wrong. You kids sit tight.
translation.es: Los relojes deben estar mal. Esperen aquí.

translation.en: We'll check our sunrise charts at the station.
Oh, you never know.
Maybe a trickster spirit changed our clocks. [laughs]
translation.es: Tal vez un espíritu bromista cambió los relojes.

translation.en: I wonder why Sunny isn't up. He's the definition of a morning person.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no habrá salido Sol? Es el típico madrugador.

translation.en: Hmm, DeeDee said a trickster might have changed our clocks.
translation.es: DeeDee dijo que tal vez un bromista cambió los relojes.

translation.en: Maybe Coyote knows what's going on.
Let's go to Spirit Park and find out.
translation.es: Vamos al Parque Espíritu a averiguarlo.

translation.en: [woman] ♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Calling on Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Calling Kodi, Summer, Eddy ♪
translation.es: Vamos, los llamamos, Kodi, Summer, Eddy.

translation.en: Kodi cub! [roars]
Summer hawk! [screeches]
♪ Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Spirit Rangers ♪
And Eddy turtle!
♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Calling on Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ They're Spirit Ranger ready ♪
Sunny!
Qsi!
[Eddy] Where are you?
Hi, 'Away. Have you seen Sunny?
Nope, he's probably playing stick game with the star spirits.
translation.es: No. Debe estar jugando con los espíritus estrellas.

translation.en: But now that he's gone, I can finally redecorate.
translation.es: Ya que no está, por fin puedo redecorar.

translation.en: It's beautiful.
Have you seen Coyote? He might be able to help us find Sunny.
translation.es: ¿Has visto a Coyote? Podría ayudarnos a encontrar a Sol.

translation.en: [groans] You're no fun. He's over there.
So, I heard you're looking for a missing Sunny.
Yes. Have you seen him?
Or are you hiding him and pranking us?
translation.es: ¿O lo ocultas y nos juegas una broma?

translation.en: If you think I took Sunny, you're barking up the wrong coyote.
translation.es: Si creen que me llevé a Sol, se equivocan de coyote.

translation.en: I was too busy polishing this shiny seashell.
-Cool, huh? -[clatters]
-Uh, whoops. -Hey! Those are our winner sticks.
If you're hiding our sticks, what else are you hiding?
translation.es: Si escondes nuestros palos, ¿qué más escondes?

translation.en: [Kodi] Come on, Coyote. Where is he?
I don't know!
I may have "borrowed" your sticks, but I'd never steal Sunny.
translation.es: Tomé prestados sus palos, pero nunca robaría a Sol.

translation.en: -I promise. -Are you sure? No tricky stuff?
Listen, I don't pull those kinds of tricks,
translation.es: Yo no hago esa clase de trucos,

translation.en: but I know some trickster spirits who do.
There are more trickster spirits?
Oh, yeah. Moon, little help?
[groans] Fine.
[Summer gasps] A moon shadow show? -Cool! -Wow!
Once upon a cloud, there were four prank-loving pals.
translation.es: Había una vez, cuatro amigos amantes de las bromas.

translation.en: First is Raven spirit from the Pacific Northwest.
She's the brains behind most of their pranks.
translation.es: Es quien planea la mayoría de sus bromas.

translation.en: This wouldn't be the first time she's tried to get her talons on Sunny.
translation.es: No sería la primera vez que intenta atrapar a Sol.

translation.en: Second is Rabbit spirit from the Southeast.
He's a loose cannon who loves two things, carrots and pranks.
translation.es: que ama dos cosas, las zanahorias y las bromas.

translation.en: And he's all out of carrots.
And third is Raccoon spirit from the Northeast.
She's the muscle of the team.
She's so strong,
I once saw her move Woodpecker's tree to the South Pole while he was sleeping.
translation.es: que movió el árbol de Carpintero al Polo Sur mientras él dormía.

translation.en: He woke up frozen!
-Oh, no! -[both gasp]
I'm turtle trembling.
[Coyote] They call themselves the Trickster Trio.
translation.es: Se hacen llamar el Trío Bromista.

translation.en: They'll prank any spirit, human, or even Sunny himself!
translation.es: ¡Bromean con cualquier espíritu, humano, hasta con Sol!

translation.en: But why would they steal him?
Probably because he keeps beating them at stick game.
translation.es: Quizá porque les gana en el juego del palo.

translation.en: [chuckling] They hate to lose, and Sunny just loves to brag.
translation.es: Odian perder, y a Sol le encanta alardear.

translation.en: Hmm, didn't you say there were four prank-loving pals, Coyote?
translation.es: ¿No dijiste que había cuatro amantes de las bromas?

translation.en: Well, yeah. I kinda, sorta, maybe, definitely used to work with them.
translation.es: Bueno, sí. Yo más o menos solía trabajar con ellos.

translation.en: [gasps] How do we know you're not still pranking with them now?
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabemos que ya no bromeas con ellos?

translation.en: Hold your horse spirits.
When we were partners, we just did petty jokes.
translation.es: Cuando éramos socios, hacíamos bromas tontas.

translation.en: But once they started with the high pranks and goofs-demeanors, it was too much.
translation.es: Pero sus travesuras y tonterías ya eran demasiado.

translation.en: Even for me! I had to get out.
[groans] I'll prove it to you.
I know where to find them. But be on your toes.
Their hideouts might be full of pranks. Come on.
translation.es: Sus escondites estarán llenos de bromas. Vamos.

translation.en: Hey, you pranked me.
Oops, sorry. [chuckling] I told you there would be pranks.
translation.es: Lo siento. Les dije que habría bromas.

translation.en: [screams] Snakes!
[groans] Coyote!
I didn't know they'd have prank snakes. Honest.
translation.es: No sabía que tendrían serpientes de broma. En serio.

translation.en: This feels like a wild-coyote chase.
translation.es: Esto es una pérdida de tiempo.

translation.en: We've looked everywhere for the Trickster Trio, and we've only gotten pranked.
translation.es: Buscamos al Trío Bromista, y solo nos hicieron bromas.

translation.en: Okay, there were a lot of pranks, but I promise I didn't know about them.
translation.es: Había muchas bromas, pero yo no sabía de ellas.

translation.en: Even if they were kind of funny. [laughs] Let's keep looking.
Maybe we should look for Sunny on our own.
translation.es: Deberíamos buscar a Sol por nuestra cuenta.

translation.en: Yeah, I think Coyote is just gonna lead us to more pranks.
translation.es: Sí, creo que Coyote nos llevará hacia más bromas.

translation.en: Summer, can you try to spot Sunny with your hawk-eye vision?
translation.es: Summer, ¿buscas a Sol con tu visión de halcón?

translation.en: On it! I'll be back in a squawk.
[gasps] That light looks just like Sunny. Come on!
[sighs] At least you're still with me, right, flower?
Prank flower.
You guys see this?
Oh, never mind.
It's Sunny.
We found him.
-Shh! Look. -Huh?
Coyote was right about one thing, the Trickster Trio is real.
translation.es: Coyote tenía razón en una cosa, el Trío Bromista es real.

translation.en: Huddle up, Rangers. It's game time, and I've got a plan.
translation.es: Vengan, guardaespíritus. Es hora de actuar. Tengo un plan.

translation.en: I'll paint a big red X on the ground and put a fresh bugsagna on it.
translation.es: Haré una X en el suelo y pondré una bichosaña.

translation.en: Spirits love bugsagna.
Then, Eddy, you build a cage out of sticks.
translation.es: Eddy, construye una jaula con palos.

translation.en: And, Kodi, you drop the cage to trap them.
translation.es: Y, Kodi, atrápalos con la jaula.

translation.en: [roars softly] All right.
With the Trio trapped, we can save Sunny.
translation.es: Con el Trío atrapado, podemos salvar a Sol.

translation.en: Hey, look! There's a plate of bugsagna we can use.
Wait, where did that come from? And has this red X always been here?
translation.es: Espera, ¿de dónde salió eso? ¿Y esta X roja ya estaba aquí?

translation.en: -[Eddy screams] -[Kodi] Oh no!
You thought you could trap us with a bugsagna gag?
translation.es: ¿Creían que nos atraparían con una bichosaña?

translation.en: We wrote the book on bugsagna gags.
Hey, they think we're pranking amateurs. [laughs]
We was one hop ahead of you this whole time.
translation.es: Íbamos un salto por delante de ustedes.

translation.en: -Who are you anyway? -We're the Spirit Rangers.
-Now, give Sunny back. -No deal. Sunny stays with us.
translation.es: - Devuelvan a Sol. - No. Sol se queda con nosotros.

translation.en: Yes. And remember, you can never out-trick the Trickster Trio!
translation.es: Sí. Y recuerden, ¡nunca podrán superar al Trío Bromista!

translation.en: They're just too tricky.
[sighs] I don't think we'll get Sunny back. Unless we think like a trickster.
translation.es: No recuperaremos a Sol si no pensamos como bromistas.

translation.en: I know just who to ask. Come on!
-[in a flat voice] Ah! Prank snake. Oh no! -[footsteps approaching]
Oh, Spirit Rangers, you're back.
Coyote, you were right. It was the Trickster Trio all along.
translation.es: Coyote, tenías razón. Era el Trío Bromista.

translation.en: They took Sunny and, uh-- Wait.
translation.es: Se llevaron a Sol y… Un momento.

translation.en: What are you doing with that prank snake?
translation.es: ¿Qué haces con esa serpiente de broma?

translation.en: Uh… Nothing. It's not what it looks like. I'm not planning a prank right now.
translation.es: Nada. No es lo que parece. No planeo una broma.

translation.en: Look, I might be a trickster spirit, but I'm also your friend. Trust me.
translation.es: Soy un espíritu bromista, pero soy su amigo. Confíen en mí.

translation.en: ♪ I may enjoy a little joke From time to time ♪
translation.es: Quizá me guste hacer una broma de vez en cuando.

translation.en: ♪ All right, so I'm a prankster In his pranking prime ♪
translation.es: Muy bien, soy un bromista en su mejor momento.

translation.en: ♪ But when it comes to friendship I'm steady as an oak ♪
translation.es: Pero cuando de amistad se trata, soy firme como un roble.

translation.en: ♪ I'm here for you And that's no joke ♪
translation.es: Estoy aquí para ustedes, y eso no es broma.

translation.en: ♪ I've pulled some wild shenanigans To great acclaim ♪
translation.es: He hecho algunas travesuras con gran éxito.

translation.en: ♪ The trickiest of tricksters In the trickster hall of fame ♪
translation.es: El más bromista de los bromistas en el salón de la fama de los bromistas.

translation.en: ♪ But friendship is a promise That I will not revoke ♪
translation.es: Pero la amistad es una promesa que no revocaré.

translation.en: ♪ I'm here for you And that's no joke ♪
translation.es: Estoy aquí para ustedes, y eso no es broma.

translation.en: ♪ There comes a time When even I get serious ♪
translation.es: Llega un momento en el que hasta yo me pongo serio.

translation.en: ♪ A time when All the joking finally ends ♪
translation.es: Un momento en el que se acaban las bromas.

translation.en: ♪ And when you need my help I'm always serious ♪
translation.es: Y cuando necesitan mi ayuda, siempre soy serio.

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we're seriously friends ♪
♪ I swear that you can trust me And I'm not blowing smoke ♪
translation.es: Juro que pueden confiar en mí, y no estoy mintiendo.

translation.en: ♪ I'm here for you And that's no joke ♪
translation.es: Estoy aquí para ustedes, y eso no es broma.

translation.en: We're sorry we didn't believe you, Coyote.
I know I can be tricky, but not when our friends need help.
translation.es: Soy bromista, pero no cuando los amigos necesitan ayuda.

translation.en: [screams] Prank snake!
Wait a sec. Pranks got us into this mess, maybe pranks can get us out of it too.
translation.es: Esperen. Las bromas nos metieron en esto, quizá las bromas nos saquen.

translation.en: Now you're thinking like a trickster. And I know just how to out-prank them.
translation.es: Ahora piensas como un bromista. Y sé cómo superarlos.

translation.en: Hey, squirt.
Move along!
We're not giving Sunny back, capisce?
Actually, we don't need you to give us Sunny back.
translation.es: No necesitamos que nos devuelvan a Sol.

translation.en: We already have him.
That's a good one. Nice try. Nothing gets past my bird brain.
translation.es: Buena esa. Buen intento. Mi cerebro de pájaro lo pilla todo.

translation.en: See for yourself.
What?
How?
Impossible!
So pretty.
Which one of you let Sunny go?
translation.es: ¿Cuál de ustedes dejó ir a Sol?

translation.en: Hey, I couldn't have done it. I was too busy thinking about carrots.
translation.es: No pude haber sido yo. Estaba pensando en zanahorias.

translation.en: Baby carrots, and purple carrots, and--
Stop!
-[Crow] No! -[Rabbit] Don't let Sunny get away!
-It keeps slipping out of my talons! -[Rabbit] Out of my way!
[gasps] Quick! While they aren't looking!
Oh my stars. Thank you, Spirit Rangers.
translation.es: Mis estrellas. Gracias, guardaespíritus del bosque.

translation.en: Hey, tricksters. Did you miss me?
-Coyote? -What are you doing here?
Oh, just doing what I do best. Pranks.
translation.es: Solo hago lo que mejor sé hacer. Bromas.

translation.en: That's not Sunny!
-No! -[Crow] You foiled us this time,
but this isn't the last you've seen of the Trickster Trio!
translation.es: ¡pero no será la última vez que veas al Trío Bromista!

translation.en: Thanks, Coyote. We couldn't have saved Sunny without you.
translation.es: Gracias, Coyote. - No lo habríamos salvado sin ti. - Para eso están los amigos.

translation.en: That's what friends are for. And for playing pranks and games with.
translation.es: - No lo habríamos salvado sin ti. - Para eso están los amigos. - Y para jugar bromas y juegos. - Hablando de juegos…

translation.en: Speaking of games, we can finally play stick game!
translation.es: - Y para jugar bromas y juegos. - Hablando de juegos… ¡podemos jugar al palo!

translation.en: Well, you're gonna need these winner sticks.
[Dad] Eddy's first. Guess. Which hand do you think has the striped stick, hon?
translation.es: - Eddy, adivina. - ¿Qué mano tiene el palo rayado?

translation.en: Come on, Eddy.
-Kids win! -I did it!
I thought the stick was in my other hand. Weird. Maybe it was the tricksters again.
translation.es: Pensé que estaba en mi otra mano. Qué raro. Tal vez fueron los bromistas otra vez.

translation.en: -You might be right. -[giggles nervously]
Mama Bear reporting. Baby Bear, do you and Hover Hawk see the target?
translation.es: Aquí Mamá Osa. Osezno, ¿tú y Halcón ven el objetivo?

translation.en: On it, Mama Bear.
But we can't get close enough.
[Mom] Air Dad 1, do you have eyes on her?
[Dad] Aw! It's a kitty!
I'll call you P-a-sh Pay-sh. That's the Cowlitz word for "kitten."
translation.es: Te llamaré Pash Paysh. Así se dice "gatita" en cowlitz.

translation.en: -I've got you, P-a-sh Pay-sh. -[Summer] Here, kitty.
translation.es: Te tengo, Pash Paysh. Ven, gatita.

translation.en: -[meowing] -[Mom] Oh, goodness!
Got you, little kitty.
Good catch, Eddy.
-[giggles] -Is P-a-sh Pay-sh okay?
I think so.
Hmm. I'm not seeing a collar. She might be a stray.
translation.es: No tiene collar. Podría ser callejera.

translation.en: A stray?
There's no way a kitten this cute doesn't have a home.
translation.es: Imposible que una gatita tan linda no tenga hogar.

translation.en: If P-a-sh Pay-sh doesn't have a home, what if we adopt her?
translation.es: Si Pash Paysh no tiene hogar, ¿la adoptamos?

translation.en: Aw, Eddy. Adopting a cat is a big responsibility.
translation.es: Eddy. Adoptar un gato es una gran responsabilidad.

translation.en: [sighs] Dad's right. Kittens need a lot of time and attention to be safe and happy.
translation.es: Sí. Los gatitos necesitan atención para ser felices.

translation.en: I can do it. Did you see how awesome I was when I rescued her?
That was great, Eddy, but we still think -you should wait before adopting. -Aw.
translation.es: Fue genial, Eddy, pero deberías esperar para adoptar un gato.

translation.en: [Mom] My friends at the cat rescue will find her a home.
translation.es: Mis amigos del refugio le hallarán un hogar.

translation.en: Now let's get you cleaned up. You're one adventurous kitty.
translation.es: Ahora vamos a limpiarte, gatita aventurera.

translation.en: But we can keep her here. [sighs] I want a cat more than anything.
translation.es: Podemos tenerla aquí. Quiero un gato más que nada.

translation.en: [softly] Excuse me. Do you mind lowering your voices?
translation.es: Disculpen. ¿Bajan la voz? No quiero despertar a mis gatitos.

translation.en: I don't want to wake my kittens.
translation.es: ¿Bajan la voz? No quiero despertar a mis gatitos.

translation.en: I spent the past hour purring them to sleep.
translation.es: Ronroneé una hora para que se durmieran.

translation.en: [gasps] Did you say "kittens"?
-[both] Shh! -They're asleep.
-[whispers] Did you say "kittens"? -Sure did.
I'm Tuk'e'm, the Chumash mountain lion spirit.
translation.es: Soy Tuk'e'm, el espíritu de puma chumash.

translation.en: These are my spirit kittens, -Meow Meow, Mittens, and Lalanxa. -[snoring]
translation.es: Estos son mis espíritus gatitos, Miau Miau, Mittens y Lalanxa.

translation.en: I love kittens.
So cute.
They're just like P-a-sh Pay-sh! I wish we could play with them.
translation.es: ¡Son como Pash Paysh! Quisiera jugar con ellos.

translation.en: Well, you can!
I've heard Spirit Rangers take care of every crook, cranny, and critter.
translation.es: Dicen que los guardaespíritus cuidan cada recodo, rendija y criatura.

translation.en: Want to kitten-sit for me?
-Uh… -I don't think we're ready to--
We'll do it. I know Mom and Dad said we're not ready.
translation.es: - No estamos listos para… - Sí. Mamá y papá dijeron que no,

translation.en: -But I think we're responsible enough. -Well, they are super cute.
translation.es: - pero creo que somos responsables. - Son superlindos.

translation.en: Thanks.
Yeah. Maybe it won't be that hard.
translation.es: Sí. Quizá no sea tan difícil.

translation.en: Creator knows I could use a nap.
translation.es: El Creador sabe que necesito una siesta.

translation.en: Have fun with the Spirit Rangers, my babies.
translation.es: Diviértanse con los guardaespíritus del bosque, bebés.

translation.en: -Meow, meow. -Haku!
Play, Spirit Rangers.
This cannot be good.
We got this. Let's go to Spirit Park, where we could have some real fun.
translation.es: Podemos hacerlo. Vamos a divertirnos al Parque Espíritu.

translation.en: [woman] ♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Calling on Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Calling Kodi, Summer, Eddy ♪
translation.es: Vamos, los llamamos, Kodi, Summer, Eddy.

translation.en: Kodi cub! [roars]
Summer hawk! [screeches]
♪ Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Spirit Rangers ♪
And Eddy turtle!
♪ Let's go, Spirit Rangers ♪ ♪ Calling on Spirit Rangers ♪
♪ They're Spirit Ranger ready ♪
-Kittens, are you ready to play? -[meowing]
Play!
[groans] Are you kitten me?
Ah, so, you're watching the spirit kittens. They can be a pawful. [chuckles]
translation.es: ¿Cuidan a los espíritus gatitos? Dan mucha guerra.

translation.en: Tell me about it. They won't stop chasing my sunbeams.
translation.es: Dímelo a mí. No paran de perseguir mis rayos de sol.

translation.en: No. No. No!
Spirit Park might not be able to handle cute kittens, but I can.
translation.es: Quizá el Parque Espíritu no pueda con los gatitos lindos, pero yo sí.

translation.en: ♪ You know who's simply purr-fect And paw-sitively great? ♪
translation.es: ¿Saben quién es sencillamente perfecto y genial?

translation.en: ♪ All these little kitties I could play with every day ♪
translation.es: Estos gatitos con los que a diario podría jugar.

translation.en: ♪ I am smitten by these kittens ♪
♪ I am smitten by these kittens ♪
♪ No, I ain't kitten' I am smitten ♪
translation.es: No, no bromeo. Me tienen loco.

translation.en: ♪ There's a paw-sibility You're all my best fur-ends ♪
translation.es: Tal vez ustedes sean mis mejores amigos.

translation.en: ♪ There will be no cat-tastrophes On Eddy you can depend ♪
translation.es: No habrá catástrofes. Con Eddy pueden contar.

translation.en: ♪ I am smitten by these kittens ♪
♪ I am smitten by these kittens ♪
♪ No, I ain't kitten' I am smitten ♪
translation.es: No, no bromeo. Me tienen loco.

translation.en: See? This is easy.
translation.es: ¿Ven? Es fácil. Tenemos todo bajo control.

translation.en: -We've got this covered like fur on a cat. -[Coyote] Are you sure?
translation.es: ¿Ven? Es fácil. Tenemos todo bajo control. ¿Seguro?

translation.en: It looks like Mittens is about to jump into a dangerous volcano.
translation.es: Parece que Mittens saltará a un volcán peligroso.

translation.en: -No! -Mittens!
-Stop! -[screams]
Gotcha.
-Little stink bug. -[Mittens giggles]
-Good save. -[meowing]
That was close.
Hey, uh, real quick.
Did anyone else feel a kitten try to jump inside their head or was that just me?
translation.es: ¿Alguien más sintió a un gatito en la cabeza o fui solo yo?

translation.en: -Nope. -Eh, not any more than usual.
translation.es: - No. - No más de lo normal.

translation.en: Sorry, Lawetlat'la. We'll play somewhere a little less lava-y.
translation.es: Perdón, Lawetlat'la. Jugaremos en un lugar con menos lava.

translation.en: Yeah. We need to tire them out before they pounce again.
translation.es: Debemos cansarlos antes de que vuelvan a saltar.

translation.en: -Too late. -Whee!
Looks like it's time for a turtle tumble!
-Seriously?! Come on! -Yeah!
Dad was right. Taking care of animals is harder than it looks.
translation.es: Papá tenía razón. Es difícil cuidar animales.

translation.en: No, it isn't. We got this. And just look at them.
translation.es: No lo es. Podemos hacerlo. Míralos.

translation.en: All of this playing has finally tuckered them out.
-[yawning] -I want bugsagna.
You and me both, little guy.
After all of this running and playing, I need to hibernate.
translation.es: Después de tanto correr y jugar, necesito hibernar.

translation.en: [yawns] I'll just rest my hawk eyes for a second.
translation.es: Descansaré mis ojos de halcón un segundo.

translation.en: See? Kitten-sitting is… [yawns] …easy.
-[Spirit Rangers snoring] -Hey, uh, Spirit Rangers, you might want to wake up.
-What? -Why?
Five more minutes.
Let's just say the kittens woke up, ran off,
and are causing chaos all over the park! Which is usually my job.
translation.es: y tienen el parque en caos. Ese es mi trabajo.

translation.en: -[suspenseful music plays] -Oh no. We need to find them quick.
-Huh? -[caws] This is not a scratching post!
Summer hawk to the rescue!
-Sorry, Condor. We'll fix your home later. -[giggles]
translation.es: Perdón, Cóndor. Luego arreglaremos tu casa.

translation.en: Don't you dare! That's my best friend's forever mug.
translation.es: ¡No te atrevas! Es mi taza de amigos por siempre.

translation.en: [giggles] Cup!
There. Your cup is safe and sound. -And Lalanxa is coming with me. -[yelps]
translation.es: Listo. Tu taza está sana y salva. Y Lalanxa viene conmigo.

translation.en: -[giggles, purrs] -Come here, kitty.
Oh, no, you don't.
It felt like a kitten tried to jump into my head again.
translation.es: Volví a sentir a un gatito en mi cabeza.

translation.en: Weird. Maybe I need to clear out my sinuses.
translation.es: Qué raro. Debería despejarme un poco.

translation.en: For being so cute, these kittens sure are troublemakers.
translation.es: Son muy lindos, pero son unos gatitos problemáticos.

translation.en: No wonder Tuk'e'm needed a cat nap. I could use another hibernation.
translation.es: Con razón Tuk'e'm necesitaba una siesta. Necesito otra hibernación.

translation.en: -But I love them so much. -Play!
We've just gotta keep them safe and in one place.
translation.es: Debemos tenerlos a salvo y en un lugar.

translation.en: I have the perfect idea of how to keep them together.
translation.es: Tengo la idea perfecta para mantenerlos juntos.

translation.en: -Welcome to your new kitten playpen. -[kittens laughing] Wow!
-[meowing, purring] -[Summer] Purr-fect idea, Eddy!
translation.es: ¡Buena idea, Eddy! Tienen juguetes, una torre para gatos, comida y agua.

translation.en: They have toys, a cat tower, -food and water. -[purrs]
translation.es: Tienen juguetes, una torre para gatos, comida y agua.

translation.en: And there's nothing they could destroy. This might actually work.
translation.es: Y no hay nada que puedan destruir. Esto podría funcionar.

translation.en: See? I can take care of kittens.
Now, do you kitties promise to stay put and not get into any trouble?
translation.es: ¿Prometen quedarse aquí y no meterse en problemas?

translation.en: Yep, definitely gone.
Again? Where could they be?
-I th-- thought I had it under control. -[gasps]
translation.es: Pensé que lo tenía bajo control.

translation.en: Oh no! They're at the edge of the waterfall.
-Hurry! -[Eddy] Oh no!
We can't let them fall.
This is a cat-tastrophe. We need to save them.
translation.es: Es una catástrofe. Tenemos que salvarlos.

translation.en: Wait! Remember when we tried to grab P-a-sh Pay-sh at the Ranger tower
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando intentamos agarrar a Pash Paysh en la torre

translation.en: and she got scared and fell? We need a distraction.
translation.es: y se asustó y se cayó? Hay que distraerlos.

translation.en: Hmm. What if we try distracting the kittens with things they like?
translation.es: ¿Y si los distraemos con algo que les guste?

translation.en: That's it. Once we distract them,
translation.es: Eso es. Una vez que los distraigamos,

translation.en: I can sneak up and catch them with my turtle bubbles. Come on.
translation.es: puedo atraparlos con mis burbujas tortuga. Vamos.

translation.en: Here, kitty, kitty, kitty.
-Over here! -Pretty kitty!
Look at the feathers.
Tickle, tickle!
[Coyote] Wanna play?
I know you want the toy. Yes, you do.
translation.es: Sé que quieren el juguete. Sí.

translation.en: -Oh, no! -Fun!
[Kodi] Kittens!
-No! Eddy! -[all gasp]
-[Summer] Hurry! -[kittens yelling]
There. Now you're safe and sound.
Ah, well, it's good to know the spirit kittens are okay.
translation.es: Qué bueno que los espíritus gatitos están bien.

translation.en: -Watch the tail! -[Tuk'e'm yawns]
So, what did I hiss?
I mean, miss.
Sorry, us cats hiss a lot.
translation.es: Lo siento, los gatos dormimos mucho.

translation.en: -Mama! -[giggling]
Wow, my kittens are safe, and they seem really happy.
translation.es: Vaya, mis gatitos están a salvo y parecen muy contentos.

translation.en: You can kitten-sit my babies anytime you'd like.
translation.es: Pueden cuidar a mis bebés cuando quieran.

translation.en: Tuk'e'm, we had fun kitten-sitting for you today,
but it was a lot harder than we thought it'd be.
translation.es: pero fue mucho más difícil de lo que pensábamos.

translation.en: And I'm not sure if my hawk heart can take another kitten rescue.
translation.es: No sé si mi corazón de halcón aguante otro rescate.

translation.en: Yeah. If today has taught me anything,
it's that I'll have a cat of my own someday, but I'm not ready now.
translation.es: es que algún día tendré mi gato, pero aún no estoy listo.

translation.en: Even if I love them so, so, so, so, so much.
Well, you can visit my spirit kittens any time.
translation.es: Pueden visitar a mis espíritus gatitos cuando quieran.

translation.en: Right, babies?
-[kittens mewing] -Yes!
Aw, cute.
But next time, leave the chaos to me.
translation.es: La próxima vez, déjenme el caos a mí.

translation.en: There. Now you're ready for your new family.
translation.es: Ya estás lista para tu nueva familia.

translation.en: Hi, P-a-sh Pay-sh.
translation.es: Pash Paysh, te hicimos un recuerdo especial.

translation.en: We made you something special to remember us by. Ta-da!
translation.es: Pash Paysh, te hicimos un recuerdo especial. ¡Tan-tán!

translation.en: Now you're an honorary Junior Ranger. [chuckles]
Okay, kids. Our friend at the cat rescue is here,
and she's ready to take P-a-sh Pay-sh to her new home.
translation.es: llevará a Pash Paysh a su nuevo hogar.

translation.en: Honey, seeing P-a-sh Pay-sh leave might be too much for the kids.
translation.es: Ver a Pash Paysh irse puede ser duro para los niños.

translation.en: No, it's okay. I know I'm not ready to adopt a cat yet.
translation.es: Está bien. Aún no estoy listo para adoptar un gato.

translation.en: I'm sad
but also happy P-a-sh Pay-sh is going somewhere that can take care of her.
translation.es: pero feliz porque Pash Paysh va a donde puedan cuidarla.

translation.en: That's really wise, little guy.
I know that this sort of thing can be hard,
translation.es: Sé que esto puede ser difícil,

translation.en: but I just want you to know that we found your kitten a nice home
translation.es: pero le encontramos a tu gatita un buen hogar

translation.en: with a good family that has everything a kitten could need.
translation.es: con una familia que puede darle todo lo que necesita.

translation.en: Purrfect.
-Aw. -Yay!
Hi, baby. Want to say goodbye to your friends before you go?
-[giggles] It tickles. -Aw, so cute.
-[Kodi] Bye! -Have fun in your new home!
I'm so glad I got to meet you, P-a-sh Pay-sh.
translation.es: Un gusto haberte conocido, Pash Paysh.
